body:
There are failures in the Windows build that look related to this PR, including (but not limited to):
```
17:34:30   File "C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\contrib\seq2seq\python\ops\attention_wrapper.py", line 195, in __init__
17:34:30     score_mask_value = self._memory_layer.dtype.as_numpy_dtype(-np.inf)
17:34:30 AttributeError: 'str' object has no attribute 'as_numpy_dtype'
```
